pullrequest.title: Add training as a segway-task and create observations in a temporary directory

content.raw: All tests still need to be updated. Notably the cmdline logs now contain the segway-task command instead of the gmtk command specifically. Should this be changed back to the gmtk command specifically? Viterbi cmdline logs already use the segway-task command.
content.html: All tests still need to be updated. Notably the cmdline logs now contain the segway-task command instead of the gmtk command specifically. Should this be changed back to the gmtk command specifically? Viterbi cmdline logs already use the segway-task command.
